ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Wallet_Opportunity_Type__c) ), OR( ISBLANK( Account.Dapp_Sub_Type__c ), AND( INCLUDES(Account.Dapp_Sub_Type__c, 'Other'), ISBLANK( Account.Dapp_Sub_Type_Other__c ) ) ), ISPICKVAL(Wallet_Opportunity_Type__c, 'Coinbase Wallet Integration') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For Opportunity Type "Coinbase Wallet Integration", it is required to fill out Dapp Sub-Type and Dapp Sub-Type Other on the Account
